HeroSection.subtitle: Protect your privacy with our open source and encrypted suite of secure services. Internxt Drive, Photos, Send, and more.

cta.title: Get started with Internxt
cta.subtitle: Create an account now and get 10GB for FREE

disclaimer.text: By creating an account you accept the
disclaimer.link: terms of service, and privacy policy

strength.length: Password has to be at least 8 characters long

FirstFeaturesSection.subtitle: Internxt creates private and secure cloud services designed to put you, the user, back in charge of your data. Protecting your files and your fundamental right to privacy, Internxt services are built from the ground up using open source software for unparalleled safety and security.

InfoSection.title: Secure cloud storage with unmatched privacy
InfoSection.description: What makes Internxt so special? We’re a tight-knit team of professionals completely dedicated to protecting you online. Everything we do and every decision we make is centered on protecting your data from being exploited.

cards.title: Private by design
cards.description: We don’t store passwords or user data and all of your data is encrypted in-transit and at-rest. Internxt puts you in full control of your files. Your data is your business. Protecting it is ours.

cards.title: Uncompromising security
cards.description: Your files are end-to-end encrypted before ever leaving your device. Thanks to zero-knowledge AES-256 encryption, you are the absolutely only one with access to your data.

cards.title: Open source and transparent
cards.description: We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub and can be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have nothing to hide but your data.

cards.title: Independently verified
cards.description: We’re wholly GDPR compliant and 100% safe, but don’t take our word for it. Internxt has been independently audited and verified by Europe’s leading penetration testing company, Securitum.

info.title: Speed without limits
info.description: Have the need for speed? Our distributed service is optimized across lightning-fast servers scattered throughout the EU, so you can get the best performance out of your connection.

info.title: Frictionless workflows
info.description: Internxt products are streamlined to be as usable as possible while providing a clean look to enhance and boost your productivity. Business security, made easy.

info.title: Backup storage on demand
info.description: Save your data from disaster with built-in redundancy. Back up your essential work and projects, across multiple fast servers throughout the EU, and access them from all your devices.

info.title: Protection for your best moments
info.description: Store all your photos in one gallery and access them from everywhere. Save your memories straight to your phone and view them from anywhere.

ThirdFeaturesSection.title: Get up to 10GB for free!
ThirdFeaturesSection.description: Create your free account now and get full access to our suite of online privacy services.

card1.title: Built for the future
card1.description: We want to build a better World Wide Web, one that’s fair, safe, and equitable for all. The battle is raging for the future of internet privacy, and we’re at the frontline.

card2.title: All your devices, one seamless experience
card2.description: Internxt is available on all platforms, even Linux! Sync your files and photos with our mobile, web, and desktop apps, each engineered to supercharge your encrypted storage on the go.

card3.title: Try Internxt for free
card3.description: Get up to 10GB free and see if privacy suits you before going all in! 2GB for creating an account, and then expand your free storage to the full 10GB for helping to get the word out.

SecondWhatWeDoSection.title: You are not the product
SecondWhatWeDoSection.description: Our services are tools built for you. Drive, Photos and Send are just the beginning of a full family of products that put you back in charge of your privacy.

square1.title: Internxt Drive
square1.subtitle: The safest cloud storage for all your files, photos, and more
square1.description: Take back control of your files and data with Internxt Drive. Storing and backing up your files in complete privacy couldn’t be any easier. Modern cloud storage meets military-grade encryption.

square2.title: Internxt Photos
square2.subtitle: Secure online photo storage for all your picture-perfect moments
square2.description: Relive, share, and keep your best memories safe all in one place with Internxt Photos. Always have your photos on hand and conveniently sync images back and forth between devices.

square3.title: Internxt Send
square3.subtitle: Encrypt, share, and send large files with absolute certainty
square3.description: Send allows you to end-to-end encrypt and share large files fast without worrying about the security of your documents, images, or videos. Transfer to anyone in total confidentiality.

cards.name: Eva W.
cards.review: Internxt is a convenient cloud storage service for privacy-conscious clients. It has a streamlined interface and a reliable support team, which makes it a great option for those who need to store their files securely.

cards.name: Cristian M.
cards.review: The best encrypted Dropbox alternative. Overall: We needed an alternative that allowed us to store client files and work (social media files) and as Internxt is GDPR friendly fit perfectly for us!

cards.name: Josep C.
cards.review: I've been using Google Drive for several years, but I needed an alternative which granted me the privacy of my data. Something that Google or other well known platforms can't do. That's why I moved to Internxt.

cards.name: Pat G.
cards.review: I am storing files for a non-profit organization and working with Internxt was marvelous! This drive was very easy to use. I didn't have to do anything but upload and download. The program and drive did the rest!

cards.name: Luca C.
cards.review: The future of cloud storage! Love the fact that finally we have an affordable encrypted and secure cloud storage software that also has a very cool look and is user-friendly.

cards.name: Binet S.
cards.review: Fast, reliable, and inexpensive - best components of any product! The ample storage space is definitely appreciated! I have enough of space to save all of my photos and files. I also like how simple it is to share files.

subtitle.line1: Our clients are very happy with Internxt Drive, but
subtitle.line2: they are happier knowing they are in total privacy.
